attributes.action: Help remove the landmines we left in Egypt
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.aljazeera.com/programmes/general/2010/03/201033143946840949.html

We left land mines during world war 2 in Egypt and for 70 years, have not bothered to clear them up. Many Egyptians have sadly suffered as a result.

We left the land mines there and so it should be our responsibility to help clear them. Every child that loses a limb a those area's is unacceptable. This is a petition to the British Government to allocate funds or personell to help assist the removal of these land mines and help with those who have suffered from them in the way of injuries and such like.
